title: Marketing website similar in style and structure to tokenspot.com

requirements.text: Create a responsive, multi-section marketing website inspired by the layout and interaction patterns of https://tokenspot.com/en, using original content and assets (do not copy text/images from the reference site). Include at minimum: a top navigation bar, a hero section with a clear headline/subheadline and primary CTA button, a features/benefits section, a how-it-works section, a roadmap/timeline section, an FAQ accordion, and a footer with link groups.
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage renders all required sections in a clear order and resembles a modern crypto/product landing page structure similar to the reference site (without duplicating content).
Navigation allows jumping to page sections (anchor links) and works on mobile and desktop.
FAQ items expand/collapse with accessible keyboard interaction.
All sections are responsive and readable on common breakpoints (mobile/tablet/desktop).

requirements.text: Define and apply a coherent visual theme for the site (colors, typography, spacing, components) with a distinct style appropriate for a modern token/product landing page. Avoid a blue/purple primary palette unless explicitly requested.
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent design system is evident across headings, buttons, cards, and section spacing.
Primary/secondary button styles are consistent across the page.
Theme uses a non-blue/purple primary color palette by default.

requirements.text: Add required static generated images to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the homepage (e.g., logo in navbar/footer, hero illustration in hero section, feature icons in the features section).
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist at frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the UI.
Images are optimized for web display and scale appropriately across breakpoints.
No images are fetched from the reference site at runtime.

constraints: Frontend must be built with React + TypeScript and styled with Tailwind; compose existing UI components rather than editing any read-only component sources under frontend/src/components/ui.
No third-party authentication integrations; Internet Identity is the only supported auth (not required for this marketing site unless explicitly requested later).
Use original copy and original/generated visual assets; do not reuse/copy tokenspot.com text, branding, or images.
nonGoals: Implementing token trading, wallets, staking, on-chain transactions, or any financial features.
Building an admin dashboard/CMS for editing page content.
Adding real-time chat, push notifications, or third-party social login.

required: Wordmark logo with simple geometric mark, warm dark theme friendly (tokenspot-like modern style but original) (brand-logo.dim_512x160.png)
Hero illustration: abstract 3D coins/tokens with subtle glow on dark background, original composition (hero-illustration.dim_1400x900.png)
Set of 6 minimalist feature icons (security, speed, transparency, community, rewards, analytics) in consistent line style (feature-icons-sprite.dim_1024x256.png)
Subtle seamless background pattern (abstract grid/particles) suitable for dark sections (bg-pattern.dim_1600x1600.png)

preferencesToAdd: User-facing text must be in English.
